Men's Hoodies

20 Nov 2025

This is my favorite hoodie

I have fallen when it comes to fashion. At one time it was all about the look and now comfort trumps all and I live in a hoodie almost all the time now.

Photo by Mediamodifier on Unsplash

Jim’s Pick

If I had to pick one hoodie, it would be this one because, I would like to have no logo at all but I am the odd one and this is the best it gets then it’s this one:

adidas Men’s Essentials Fleece Hoodie, Shadow Brown, Small at Amazon Men’s Clothing store

All you really need is a clean hoodie a white t-shirt underneath and some comfortable shoes and you’re ready to go.

I’m kind of allergic to logos, but the Adidas stuff is well made for the most part so that’s why I would buy this one over others, but there’s a few other options to consider when buying the best hooded sweatshirt for your wardrobe

Also worth considering:

Hanes Men’s Full-Zip Eco-Smart Hoodie, Navy, Large at Amazon Men’s Clothing store

Hanes Men’s Pullover EcoSmart Hooded Sweatshirt, Navy, Large at Amazon Men’s Clothing store
